Fort_Wayne.Hilliard Gates Sports Center: Hilliard Gates Sports Center is a multi-purpose arena located in the northeast corner of the Indiana University-Purdue University Fort Wayne campus, in Fort Wayne, Indiana. It opened in 1981 and contains 68,106 square feet (6,327.3 m2) of space. It is home to the Fort Wayne Mastodons volleyball and men's and women's basketball teams.
